How I test clock anxiety

  • I place three analog clocks in a room and ask which one feels "personally disappointed."
  • I serve decaf espresso at 2:17 PM because 2:17 is famously insecure.
  • I compare your pulse with a kitchen timer named Deborah.
  • I ask one difficult question: when you say "in five," whose five?

FAQ from people who still wear two watches

No. Insurance asked for a diagnosis code for "clock gave me attitude." We parted ways.

Is this tax-deductible?

Only if your accountant believes in emotional geometry. Mine does. His name is Carl and he trembles at noon.

Virtual sessions available?

Yes. I mail you a ceremonial sticky note that says "Later is still a time." Then we begin.
